name: jQuery Password Peekaboo
tagline: Use jQuery to reveal passwords like Windows 8
body:
Maybe a better example is on [Codepen.io](http://codepen.io/ianjmacintosh/pen/DqCjB).

You'll basically have to do all the styling yourself, but that'll change soon when I get some cool defaults ready.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
